text: today I'm making a really fun treat that
only has three ingredients and it takes
no time at all but you need our graham
crackers that are broken you just break
them into quarters you meet six whole
graham crackers broken into 24 pieces
then what you want to do is melt some
chocolate I'm using semi-sweet you can
use bittersweet if you like it really
bitter go right ahead and then just melt
your chocolate over not touching
simmering water and meanwhile you can be
toasting some coconut this coconuts
already toasted you'll toast it at 350
degrees for just about ten minutes when
you're melting chocolate over heat you
want to make sure that it's simmering
water so that it gets nice and warm but
you don't want the bottom of the bowl
touching the water because if it does it
could burn the chocolate which will give
it a bad flavor so this is four ounces
of semi-sweet chocolate and it's just
about melted now so I'm gonna take it
off so it doesn't continue cooking it's
no need to overcook your chocolate and
then just keep stirring until everything
is completely melted then what you do is
you just coat the short end of each
piece of graham cracker in chocolate
just dip it in and then repeat with all
the rest of them put them on to a
parchment lined baking sheet they have
their chocolate on them and now just
sprinkle each piece with some coconut
and the chocolate will make the coconut
stick get these in the refrigerator
until the chocolate is set that should
take no more than 10 minutes and then
you have a finished treat
they're done gotta love that three
ingredients ten minutes
fantastic treat mmm it's all good so fun
so easy get the kids involved they're
gonna love it
